Achievement.Description: Help Griggs and Sheckley hold off the antlion invasion inside the mine shaft.
Achievement.Name: Into The Breach

Achievement.Description: Defeat both antlion guards outside the White Forest.
Achievement.Name: Twofer

Achievement.Description: Run over 20 enemies with the car in Episode Two.
Achievement.Name: Hit And Run

Achievement.Description: Survive the Hunter ambush with Alyx.
Achievement.Name: Meet The Hunters

Achievement.Description: Defeat the chopper in Episode Two without any misses.
Achievement.Name: Puttin' On A Clinic

Achievement.Description: Destroy the Combine Autogun in the junkyard.
Achievement.Name: Gunishment!

Achievement.Description: Find every radar cache in chapter Under The Radar.
Achievement.Name: Cache Checker

Achievement.Description: Beat DOG in a race to the White Forest base.
Achievement.Name: Pedal To The Metal

Achievement.Description: Unlock the rocket launcher lambda cache in chapter Under The Radar.
Achievement.Name: Gordon Propelled Rocket

Achievement.Description: Survive the ambush at White Forest Inn.
Achievement.Name: Quiet Mountain Getaway

Achievement.Description: Secure the launch doors on missile silo 2.
Achievement.Name: Secondary Silo Secured

Achievement.Description: Save the missile silo from the Combine offensive.
Achievement.Name: Defense Of The Armament

Achievement.Description: Kill 30 enemies with thrown physics objects.
Achievement.Name: Bone Breaker

Achievement.Description: Kill an enemy by planting a hopper mine.
Achievement.Name: Deadly Harvest

Achievement.Description: Steal a Zombine's grenade.
Achievement.Name: Grave Robber

Achievement.Description: Rescue a Survivor from a Smoker's tongue before he takes damage.
Achievement.Name: Drag And Drop

Achievement.Description: You or another Survivor take no damage after being vomited on by a Boomer.
Achievement.Name: Blind Luck

Achievement.Description: Protect any Survivor from an attacking Infected 50 times.
Achievement.Name: My Bodyguard

Achievement.Description: Shove a Hunter off of a pinned and helpless Survivor.
Achievement.Name: Hunter Punter

Achievement.Description: Set 101 Infected on fire.
Achievement.Name: 101 Cremations

Achievement.Description: Kill a Tank without it dealing any damage to a Survivor.
Achievement.Name: Tankbusters

Achievement.Description: Beat a campaign with all 4 Survivors.
Achievement.Name: No-One Left Behind

Achievement.Description: Blow up 20 Infected in a single explosion.
Achievement.Name: Pyrotechnician

Achievement.Description: Kill an Infected with a single blow from behind.
Achievement.Name: Spinal Tap

Achievement.Description: Make 100 headshot kills.
Achievement.Name: Brain Salad

Achievement.Description: Survive the No Mercy campaign.
Achievement.Name: Mercy Killer

Achievement.Description: Catch a rare strain of infection, then pass it on to someone else.
Achievement.Name: Outbreak

Achievement.Description: Complete one round of Survival on The Last Stand.
Achievement.Name: Last Stand

Achievement.Description: Earn a Bronze medal in Survival mode on any official level.
Achievement.Name: Bronze Mettle

Achievement.Description: Earn your White Belt.
Achievement.Name: Enrollment Special!

Achievement.Description: Earn your Red Belt.
Achievement.Name: Red Belt Ninja

Achievement.Description: Earn your Yellow Belt.
Achievement.Name: Yellow Belt Ninja

Achievement.Description: 10 of 60 Gems Earned.
Achievement.Name: Reflex Awakening

Achievement.Description: Complete 'Why Meditate?'
Achievement.Name: Art Of Breathing

Achievement.Description: Complete the 1 Minute Silent Meditation.
Achievement.Name: At One With Yourself

Achievement.Description: Complete the 3 Minute Silent Meditation.
Achievement.Name: At One With Your Home

Achievement.Description: Complete the 5 Minute Silent Meditation.
Achievement.Name: At One With Your Environment

Achievement.Description: Edit your Ninja Name.
Achievement.Name: Reflex Rebirth

Achievement.Description: Get all 6 Gems on any one Belt Rank.
Achievement.Name: Half A Dozen

Achievement.Description: Get a grab reaction time of 50ms or faster in Koi.
Achievement.Name: Slippery Fish

Achievement.Description: Finish a Nunchaku game without whiffing any targets.
Achievement.Name: Slugger

Achievement.Description: Acquire the fully powered Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device.
Achievement.Name: Lab Rat

Achievement.Description: Do whatever it takes to survive.
Achievement.Name: Fratricide

Achievement.Description: Make the correct party escort submission position decision.
Achievement.Name: Partygoer

Achievement.Description: Complete Portal.
Achievement.Name: Heartbreaker

Achievement.Description: Jump 300 feet.
Achievement.Name: Long Jump

Achievement.Description: Beat two Portal advanced maps.
Achievement.Name: Cupcake

Achievement.Description: Beat four Portal advanced maps.
Achievement.Name: Fruitcake

Achievement.Description: Knock down a turret with another turret.
Achievement.Name: Friendly Fire

Achievement.Description: Awarded for breaking a kazillion bones with a single jump. Have fun in traction!
Achievement.Name: Every Bone Broken

Achievement.Description: Complete the Training Facility
Achievement.Name: Honor Roll

Achievement.Description: Complete the Tropical Zone on Easy difficulty
Achievement.Name: King Of The Jungle

Achievement.Description: Complete the Inferno Zone on Easy difficulty
Achievement.Name: Hot Stuff

Achievement.Description: Complete the Snow Zone on Easy difficulty
Achievement.Name: Cool Ice

Achievement.Description: Complete the Sky Zone on Easy difficulty
Achievement.Name: Lord Of The Skies

Achievement.Description: Complete the Jungle Zone on Medium difficulty
Achievement.Name: King Of The Jungle

Achievement.Description: Complete the Inferno Zone on Medium difficulty
Achievement.Name: Hot Stuff

Achievement.Description: Complete the Snow Zone on Medium difficulty
Achievement.Name: Cool Ice

Achievement.Description: Complete the Sky Zone on Medium difficulty
Achievement.Name: Lord Of The Skies

Achievement.Description: Complete the Tropical Zone on Hard difficulty
Achievement.Name: King Of The Jungle

Achievement.Description: Complete the Inferno Zone on Hard difficulty
Achievement.Name: Hot Stuff

Achievement.Description: Reach a speed of 250mph
Achievement.Name: Speed Demon

Achievement.Description: Reach a height of 1,000 feet
Achievement.Name: Free Bird

Achievement.Description: Collect 50 glorbs
Achievement.Name: Glorb Scavenger

Achievement.Description: Collect 100 glorbs
Achievement.Name: Glorb Hunter

Achievement.Description: Complete 1 mission in co-op.
Achievement.Name: I Need Some Backup

Achievement.Description: Complete 10 missions in co-op.
Achievement.Name: Got Your Back

Achievement.Description: Unlock the mayor's White Limousine.
Achievement.Name: Very Important Person

Achievement.Description: Move to the harbor base.
Achievement.Name: Sunken Hope

Achievement.Description: Trigger a powerup by using the Laser, Lightning or Tri-Shot
Achievement.Name: Yo Dawg, I Herd U Like Powerups

Achievement.Description: Get a 20x Chain
Achievement.Name: Chains Of Love
